00024 //An epsilon value for comparisons

00026 #define EPSILON 0.01f

00029 /** \class VECTOR3D
00030 * Vector3D class for use from metaballs
00031 */
00032 class VECTOR3D
00033 {
00034 public:
00035         ///constructors
00036         VECTOR3D(void)  :       x(0.0f), y(0.0f), z(0.0f)
00037         {}
00038 
00039         VECTOR3D(float newX, float newY, float newZ)    :       x(newX), y(newY), z(newZ)
00040         {}
00041 
00042         VECTOR3D(const float * rhs)     :       x(*rhs), y(*(rhs+1)), z(*(rhs+2))
00043         {}
00044 
00045         VECTOR3D(const VECTOR3D & rhs)  :       x(rhs.x), y(rhs.y), z(rhs.z)
00046         {}
00047 
00048         ~VECTOR3D() {}  ///empty
00049 
00050         void Set(float newX, float newY, float newZ)
00051         {       x=newX; y=newY; z=newZ; }
00052         
00053         ///Accessors kept for compatibility
00054         void SetX(float newX) {x = newX;}
00055         void SetY(float newY) {y = newY;}
00056         void SetZ(float newZ) {z = newZ;}
00057 
00058         float GetX() const {return x;}  ///public accessor functions
00059         float GetY() const {return y;}  ///inline, const
00060         float GetZ() const {return z;}
00061 
00062         void LoadZero(void)
00063         {       x=y=z=0.0f;     }
00064         void LoadOne(void)
00065         {       x=y=z=1.0f;     }
00066         
00067         ///vector algebra
00068         VECTOR3D CrossProduct(const VECTOR3D & rhs) const
00069         {       return VECTOR3D(y*rhs.z - z*rhs.y, z*rhs.x - x*rhs.z, x*rhs.y - y*rhs.x);       }
00070 
00071         float DotProduct(const VECTOR3D & rhs) const
00072         {       return x*rhs.x + y*rhs.y + z*rhs.z;     }
00073         
00074         void Normalize();
00075         VECTOR3D GetNormalized() const;
00076         
00077         float GetLength() const
00078         {       return (float)sqrt((x*x)+(y*y)+(z*z));  }
00079         
00080         float GetSquaredLength() const
00081         {       return (x*x)+(y*y)+(z*z);       }
00082 
00083         ///rotations
00084         void RotateX(double angle);
00085         VECTOR3D GetRotatedX(double angle) const;
00086         void RotateY(double angle);
00087         VECTOR3D GetRotatedY(double angle) const;
00088         void RotateZ(double angle);
00089         VECTOR3D GetRotatedZ(double angle) const;
00090         void RotateAxis(double angle, const VECTOR3D & axis);
00091         VECTOR3D GetRotatedAxis(double angle, const VECTOR3D & axis) const;
00092 
00093         ///pack to [0,1] for color
00094         void PackTo01();
00095         VECTOR3D GetPackedTo01() const;
00096 
00097         ///linear interpolate
00098         VECTOR3D lerp(const VECTOR3D & v2, float factor) const
00099         {       return (*this)*(1.0f-factor) + v2*factor;       }
00100 
00101         VECTOR3D QuadraticInterpolate(const VECTOR3D & v2, const VECTOR3D & v3, float factor) const
00102         {       return (*this)*(1.0f-factor)*(1.0f-factor) + 2*v2*factor*(1.0f-factor) + v3*factor*factor;}
00103 
00104 
00105         ///overloaded operators
00106         ///binary operators
00107         VECTOR3D operator+(const VECTOR3D & rhs) const
00108         {       return VECTOR3D(x + rhs.x, y + rhs.y, z + rhs.z);       }
00109         
00110         VECTOR3D operator-(const VECTOR3D & rhs) const
00111         {       return VECTOR3D(x - rhs.x, y - rhs.y, z - rhs.z);       }
00112 
00113         VECTOR3D operator*(const float rhs) const
00114         {       return VECTOR3D(x*rhs, y*rhs, z*rhs);   }
00115         
00116         VECTOR3D operator/(const float rhs) const
00117         {       return (rhs==0.0f) ? VECTOR3D(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f) : VECTOR3D(x / rhs, y / rhs, z / rhs);  }
00118 
00119         ///multiply by a float, eg 3*v
00120         friend VECTOR3D operator*(float scaleFactor, const VECTOR3D & rhs);
00121 
00122         ///Add, subtract etc, saving the construction of a temporary
00123         void Add(const VECTOR3D & v2, VECTOR3D & result)
00124         {
00125                 result.x=x+v2.x;
00126                 result.y=y+v2.y;
00127                 result.z=z+v2.z;
00128         }
00129 
00130         void Subtract(const VECTOR3D & v2, VECTOR3D & result)
00131         {
00132                 result.x=x-v2.x;
00133                 result.y=y-v2.y;
00134                 result.z=z-v2.z;
00135         }
00136 
00137         bool operator==(const VECTOR3D & rhs) const;
00138         bool operator!=(const VECTOR3D & rhs) const
00139         {       return !((*this)==rhs); }
00140 
00141         ///self-add etc
00142         void operator+=(const VECTOR3D & rhs)
00143         {       x+=rhs.x;       y+=rhs.y;       z+=rhs.z;       }
00144 
00145         void operator-=(const VECTOR3D & rhs)
00146         {       x-=rhs.x;       y-=rhs.y;       z-=rhs.z;       }
00147 
00148         void operator*=(const float rhs)
00149         {       x*=rhs; y*=rhs; z*=rhs; }
00150         
00151         void operator/=(const float rhs)
00152         {       if(rhs==0.0f)
00153                         return;
00154                 else
00155                 {       x/=rhs; y/=rhs; z/=rhs; }
00156         }
00157 
00158 
00159         ///unary operators
00160         VECTOR3D operator-(void) const {return VECTOR3D(-x, -y, -z);}
00161         VECTOR3D operator+(void) const {return *this;}
00162 
00163         ///cast to pointer to a (float *) for glVertex3fv etc
00164         operator float* () const {return (float*) this;}
00165         operator const float* () const {return (const float*) this;}
00166 
00167         ///member variables
00168         float x;
00169         float y;
00170         float z;
00171 };
00172 
00173 #endif
